text:
RE: Microsoft stop messing with my people's task bar settings. Yeah, I got a prompt this morning when I logged in that they had added the Search box and asked if I wanted to keep it. NOT EVEN CLOSE! I intentionally removed it the first time around. I don’t need 15% of my task bar wasted! -- There are 10 kinds of people in the world...
 those who understand binary and those who don't. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ %40ATLEXCH04.byers.local

metadata.topic: RE: Microsoft stop messing with my people's task bar settings.
